description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
    
    Enhancements
   DIAGRAMNET-50316-Can't get 2D shape ids when called Shape.GluedShapes method
   
    Bugs      

   DIAGRAMNET-50377-VSD to VDX conversion, missing or misplaced text items
   DIAGRAMNET-50445-VSD to PDF conversion, form menu text "options" is duplicated
   DIAGRAMNET-50581-VSDX to PDF conversion, the text item of the shape is slightly misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50586-VSDX to HTML conversion, the text item of the shape is slightly misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50587-VSDX to PDF conversion, the circular shape's boundary is not visible
   DIAGRAMNET-50589-VSDX to PDF conversion, the button shape does not have boundary and fill color
   DIAGRAMNET-50590-VSDX to PDF conversion, the shape's text position is slightly misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-50592-VSDX to HTML conversion, the circular shape's boundary is not visible
   DIAGRAMNET-50594-VSDX to HTML conversion, the button shape does not have boundary and fill color
   DIAGRAMNET-50595-VSDX to HTML conversion, the shape's text position is slightly misplaced  
   DIAGRAMNET-50609-VSD to PDF conversion, the shape's text goes outside the boundary
   DIAGRAMNET-50612-VSD to PDF conversion, the shapes text items are not aligned at center
   DIAGRAMNET-50613-VSD to HTML conversion, the shapes text items are not aligned at center
   DIAGRAMNET-50638-VSD to VDX conversion, an invalid resultant file is created
   DIAGRAMNET-50640-VSD to VDX export, missing display text of the Bitmap shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-50689-Argument exception occurred when saving diagram in the VSDX
   DIAGRAMNET-50694-VSDX to VDX export, appearance of the shapes is changed
   DIAGRAMNET-50695-Can't change page orientation by setting PrintPageOrientation property
   DIAGRAMNET-50700-The signature of Aspose.Diagram for .NET 6.1.0 MSI is corrupt or invalid
   DIAGRAMNET-50709-VSDX to PDF export - the green color is applied on the shapes boundary
	 DIAGRAMNET-50710-VSD to SVG export - an arithmetic overflow error occurs
	 DIAGRAMNET-50711-VSD to SVG export - an arithmetic overflow error occurs
	 DIAGRAMNET-50717-VSD to VSDX export, Diagram.DocumentProps.Manager returns an empty string
	 DIAGRAMNET-50718-Diagram exception occurred while loading VSDX file
	 DIAGRAMNET-50719-Diagram exception occurred while loading VSDX file
	 DIAGRAMNET-50720-Diagram exception occurred while loading VSDX file
	 DIAGRAMNET-50721-VSDX to JPEG export - an empty margin is generated on the left side
	 DIAGRAMNET-50723-VSDX to PDF export - Key parameter can't be null error message occurred
	 DIAGRAMNET-50724-VDX to VSDX export generates a corrupt output file
	 DIAGRAMNET-50725-VSD to PDF export renders an incorrect hyperlink address
	 DIAGRAMNET-50732-VSD to PDF export renders incorrect formatting of the bullets
	 DIAGRAMNET-50734-VSD to PDF export includes an extra word in the shape's text
	 DIAGRAMNET-50735-VSD to HTML export includes an extra word in the shape's text
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
